title: Sun Belt Surprises & Gameday Is Going to Boone
description:
Wendi Nix, Greg McElroy, and Joey Galloway break down Marshall's upset win at Notre Dame, Texas A&M's loss to Appalachian State, and Texas 'running out of time' against Alabama. Plus, Appalachian State Head Coach Shawn Clark joins the show to discuss the Mountaineers' upset win in College Station over the Aggies and the impact of College Gameday coming to Boone in Week 3. Also, Pete Thamel joins the crew to provide an injury update on several key players and to discuss potential replacements for Scott Frost at Nebraska.
